title: Biome Sight Potion
summaries: The Biome Sight Potion is a potion that grants the Biome Sight buff upon consumption, which highlights tiles that are Corrupted, Crimson, or Hallowed. This lasts for 5 minutes, but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Console version]), or by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]).
